mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tasks ORDER BY due_date ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tasks (title, details, due_date, category, priority, completed, start_date) VALUES (#{title}, #{details}, #{dueDate}, #{category}, #{priority}, #{completed}, #{startDate})
mapper.update: UPDATE tasks SET title = #{title}, details = #{details}, due_date = #{dueDate}, category = #{category}, priority = #{priority}, completed = #{completed}, start_date = #{startDate} WHERE id = #{id}
